quadrillion

Class QGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • quadrillion.QGame

  • public class QGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a game of Quadrillion in the style of Gazillion, using QPiece objects, a QBoard object, a QTimer object, and provides the necessary functionality for piece placement and removal to and from the board.
    Version:
    20190316
    Author:
    Unsal Ozturk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QGame(QBoard board, long timeRemaining)
      Constructor for the game object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasWon()
      Checks if the game has been won or not.
      void incrementTimeRemaining(long increment)
      Increments the time remaining by a specified amount.
      boolean isOutOfTime()
      Returns if the user has run out of time.
      boolean placePieceAt(QPiece piece, QCoordinate location)
      Places a piece at a specified location on the board, such that the (0,0) coordinate of the piece fits that particular location.
      boolean removePieceAt(QCoordinate location)
      Removes a piece occupying a particular coordinate on the game board.
      void startTimer()
      Starts the timer object.
      void stopTimer()
      Stops the timer object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QGame

        public QGame(QBoard board,
             long timeRemaining)
        Constructor for the game object.
        Parameters:
        board - QBoard object on which the game will be played.
        timeRemaining - Time before which the level must be completed.

    • Method Detail

      • placePieceAt

        public boolean placePieceAt(QPiece piece,
                            QCoordinate location)
        Places a piece at a specified location on the board, such that the (0,0) coordinate of the piece fits that particular location.
        Parameters:
        piece - The QPiece instance to be placed
        location - The location at which the piece is to be placed
        Returns:
        True if the piece has been placed correctly, false if the location is occupied by another piece, or coordinate is out of bounds, or blocker is blocking the piece.

      • removePieceAt

        public boolean removePieceAt(QCoordinate location)
        Removes a piece occupying a particular coordinate on the game board.
        Parameters:
        location - The location on the board from which a piece will be removed.
        Returns:
        True if a piece was removed successfully from the board, false if the remove operation failed, i.e. no piece is available at the desired location.

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon()
        Checks if the game has been won or not.
        Returns:
        True if game was won, false otherwise.

      • isOutOfTime

        public boolean isOutOfTime()
        Returns if the user has run out of time.
        Returns:
        True if the user has run out of time, false otherwise.

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer()
        Starts the timer object.

      • stopTimer

        public void stopTimer()
        Stops the timer object.

      • incrementTimeRemaining

        public void incrementTimeRemaining(long increment)
        Increments the time remaining by a specified amount.
        Parameters:
        increment - The increment in time in milliseconds.
